Jar Decompiler

You give jar file(s), you get a .zip file containing all your Java classes!

How to use it:
  1. You can browse for a .jar file
  2. Or you can Drag and Drop .jar file(s) to the applet
For each <path/to/the/java/archive>.jar file:
  1. The .zip file containing the decompiled .java files is automatically saved to <path/to/the/java/archive_src>.zip
  2. The .zip file is automatically opened with your favorite editor if any
